integration_patterns: FHIR API for health data exchange

evidence.claim: Essential Quality Care utilizes AWS for infrastructure services.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its operations and services.
Integration with HL7 standards for health data interoperability is part of their offerings.
They mention the use of FHIR APIs for modern healthcare data solutions.

icp.icp_reason: They focus on health data exchange using EDI standards like X12, suitable for API-first solutions.
